Title: Creates a tax credit for businesses that develop a "college to work" program, paying the tuition of individuals in exchange for future employment
Summary: Creates a tax credit for businesses that develop a "college to work" program, paying the tuition of individuals in exchange for the individual committing to work for the business after the individual's graduation from an institution of higher learning; provides the tax credit shall be for twenty-five percent of the individual's tuition expenses not to exceed five thousand dollars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a credit for developing a college to work program
